page.title: 11SHOPPING SURVEY
page.content: We did a shopping survey in which we interviewed 100 people. 78% said that Farnworth was a good shopping area and for most people the shopping centre is easy to get to. In Farnworth 47% of people shop more than twice a week.97% use the two big supermarkets Asda and the CO-OP,however 68% do use the small shops as well.Most people,77%, said that they use the market. Nearly everyone, 86%, said that they on the whole Farnworth shops have reasonable prices. Most people are satisfied with the weekday closing times of the shops but on the issue of Suday Trading 51% said that they would like the shops to open whilst 46% said that they would not 2% did not know.
